Veratad Technologies, LLC SM is a world class provider of real-time online Identity Verification, Age Verification and Knowledge Based Authentication Solutions. Veratad solutions do not require the entry of the Social Security Number to verify. At the center of Veratad's success is our state-of-the-art IDresponse ® Privacy Processing Platform which delivers Veratad's AgeMatch SM our Age Verify solution, IDMatch SM and IDMatch+PLUS SM our ID Verification solutions. We also provide a wide range of proprietary unique data resources and a NEW reduced entry option. Prepare for your Red Flag Rules Program with Veratad. By using Veratad's IDresponse and Veratad VX SM Orchestration Platforms. With flexible verification tools, leverage the customer information you're already collecting and supplement with document capture and biometrics to identify and verify your customers' identities in real-time. Protection goes up, while customer friction goes down. Download Solution Overview How Veratad VX Works Our platforms offer exclusive instant access to the world's premier identity data and service providers. You can effortlessly design, test, and scale verification workflows without any coding. Identity Data Verification + Protect Your Business Without Burdening Your Customers Compare individual customer information against billions of records from top data sources worldwide in real-time. ID Document Verification + Automate collection and verification of driver's license, passport, and other ID documents. Smart Two-Factor Authentication + Go beyond "something you know and something you have†to include assurance that the "what you have†actually belongs to your customer. Biometrics + Check that your customer is who they say they are and verify that their ID document is a match using liveness and facial match technologies. Knowledge-Based Authentication + Verify customers are who they say they are using multiple choice questions as an added layer of security. Reusable Digital Identity Verification + Streamline and secure the customer onboarding process by leveraging reusable digital identity credentials. IDresponse Platform IDresponse provides the right mix of global databases, document verification, KBA, 2FA and more, to deliver the solution you need in a single API. This secure platform provides all the reliability, scalability, and flexibility your business needs to start verifying. Expert Support Veratad's implementation team guides you through setup to follow industry best practices for identity verification solutions and escalations. Frictionless User Experience Comply with strict KYC regulations while preventing money laundering and removing onboarding friction. Global Coverage IDresponse has verified over 100 million individuals worldwide. Custom Approval Rules Create your own verification rules based on your company's needs, risk tolerance or regional regulations. Verification Escalation Automate additional verification steps or build out a manual escalation process. Start Verifying Your Customers Request your personalized demo today!
